headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Halloween Modes
content: This week celebrates the gnarliest, goriest, and most gruesome that GTA Online has to offer, including 2X GTA$ and RP for conquering the claustrophobic close quarters of the Halloween Bunker Series, the recently debuted Judgement Day mode, and an array of spooky Halloween-themed modes returning to GTA Online, including Condemned, Come Out to Play and Lost vs. Damned.
